title: Can You Receive a Second $1,200 Stimulus Check by Clicking Text Link?
subtitle: The IRS warns that it will never send unsolicited text messages or emails.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: In November 2020, a text message was circulated to Americans that urged recipients to click a nefarious link in order to receive a second $1,200 COVID-19 relief stimulus check.
